name: MOTR
description:
Use Z to jump.

Use X to aim, shoot and warp.

Use the Arrow Keys to move and aim.

You're a rogue robot on the run!

Fortunately, you packed your MOTR (Matter & Other-Stuff Teleportation Reactor) and you're not afraid to use it!

Travis Root made this game in a few lazy summer days. He made the music too!

Thanks for playing it!

TIPS:

  1. Never say die! If you fall off with ammo left, you have three seconds to save yourself.
  2. Holding down X stops movement for sharper aiming.
  3. As of Patch 1 (8-12-16), the game gets harder with every win, ramping up chopper speed and building height.
